backend/main.mo: Defines core data models for products, stock, promotions, transactions, and users, and initializes in‑memory maps with access control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature implementation evidence, mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base variables and themes using OKLCH colors with light/dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React application.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app metadata, icons, and theme color.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing basic offline caching for core assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the full application router, theme provider, and app layout with all page routes.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout component providing navigation links, theme toggle, user menu, and logout handling based on user role.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Displays an alert when the browser goes offline, updating automatically based on network events.
frontend/src/features/admin/sampleData.t: Defines and saves sample categories, products, and payment methods, then queues them for backend sync.
frontend/src/features/admin/SampleDataLo: UI card that lets admins load predefined sample data into local storage with confirmation and status feedback.
frontend/src/features/admin/UsersPage.ts: User management page showing role explanations and including the sample data loader tool.
frontend/src/features/auth/AdminReauthDi: Dialog requiring admin reauthentication via Internet Identity before performing sensitive actions.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Handles authentication flow, showing login, loading, or profile setup before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/features/auth/IdleLock.tsx: Locks the session after inactivity and requires reauthentication to resume usage.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Dialog for first-time users to enter their name and role, saving the profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCurrentUse: Fetches the current user's profile and admin role using react‑query and returns loading and state flags.
frontend/src/features/barcode/barcodeRes: Searches products and their variants to find and return the matching barcode entry.
frontend/src/features/barcode/CameraBarc: Renders a camera-based barcode scanner with fallback manual input and handles camera access errors.
frontend/src/features/barcode/HidBarcode: Listens for rapid keypress sequences from HID barcode scanners and triggers onScan when Enter is pressed.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogFor: Defines product form data structure and validates required fields and pricing constraints.
frontend/src/features/catalog/CatalogPag: Provides UI for creating, editing, and listing products and categories using local master data and sync queueing.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogSto: Exports product keys and applies upsert updates by merging products into a map.
frontend/src/features/catalog/ProductCsv: Handles CSV export and import of products with error reporting and user feedback.
frontend/src/features/checkout/CheckoutP: Manages checkout flow including payments, stock updates, and transaction creation.
frontend/src/features/checkout/paymentVa: Validates payment totals and ensures at least one payment covers the amount due.
frontend/src/features/inventory/Inventor: Displays stock levels, low‑stock alerts, and allows manual stock adjustments with sync tracking.
frontend/src/features/inventory/inventor: Zustand store managing the low‑stock threshold setting.
frontend/src/features/inventory/Receivin: UI for recording received stock, updating product quantities and costs, and queuing receiving data for sync.
frontend/src/features/payments/PaymentMe: UI for listing, creating, and toggling custom payment methods with offline master data updates.
frontend/src/features/pos/cartStore.ts: Zustand store handling cart items, discounts, tax calculation, and persistence.
frontend/src/features/pos/PosPage.tsx: Point‑of‑sale UI with product search, barcode scanning, cart management, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/features/pos/priceTier.ts: Helpers for selecting price tiers and retrieving wholesale or retail pricing.
frontend/src/features/pos/productSelecto: Selector hook returning active products and a search function filtering by name, SKU, or barcode.
frontend/src/features/promotions/promoEn: Logic for checking promotion eligibility and calculating discount amounts based on promo type.
frontend/src/features/promotions/Promoti: UI for creating and managing promotions stored in offline master data.
frontend/src/features/pwa/PwaInstallGuid: Renders a PWA installation guide with install button logic, benefits list, and platform-specific instructions.
frontend/src/features/receipts/PrintRece: Provides a dialog to preview and print receipts with selectable width options.
frontend/src/features/receipts/ReceiptTe: Generates a printable receipt layout including store header, items, totals, and payments.
frontend/src/features/reports/reportCalc: Contains functions to compute daily summaries and product-level sales aggregates from transactions.
frontend/src/features/reports/ReportsPag: Displays date-filtered sales reports with summaries, product stats, and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/features/returns/ReturnFlow: Implements a returns search form and displays return policy information; backend logic is stubbed.
frontend/src/features/sync/SyncStatusPag: Shows offline sync queue status, supports manual sync, and displays pending, failed, and last sync info.
frontend/src/features/transactions/Trans: Renders a transaction detail view by loading a transaction from offline storage and displaying items, payments, and print options.
frontend/src/features/transactions/trans: Provides helpers to calculate net sales from transactions and to apply refunded items back to inventory.
frontend/src/features/void/VoidTransacti: Dialog for voiding a transaction, collecting a reason, and triggering admin reauthentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/i18n/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency, dates, and numbers using Indonesian locale.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.id.ts: Centralized Indonesian translation strings for navigation, POS, checkout, catalog, and other modules.
frontend/src/i18n/t.ts: Simple translation helpers to resolve string keys and arrays from the Indonesian locale object.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and glass-effect utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/offline/masterDataCache.ts: React Query hook for fetching cached master data from offline storage.
frontend/src/offline/storage.ts: Implements IndexedDB setup and CRUD helpers for master data, transactions, and a sync queue. Also queues new transactions for later syncing.
frontend/src/offline/syncQueue.ts: Retrieves and processes sync queue items, updating their status and retry attempts. Includes placeholder sync logic and IndexedDB update helpers.
frontend/src/pwa/useInstallPrompt.ts: Provides a React hook to manage PWA install prompts, track install availability, and trigger installation. Handles beforeinstallprompt and appinstalled events.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Exports generic data arrays to semicolon-delimited CSV files with value escaping. Creates and downloads a CSV blob.
frontend/src/utils/csvParse.ts: Exports products to semicolon-delimited CSV and imports product CSV files with validation and parsing. Constructs product objects to save or sync later.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to get, store, persist, and clear URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing. Includes sessionStorage-backed persistence helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, plugins, custom colors, typography, container settings, and animations. Extends theme with design system tokens.
project_state.json: Contains project version, goals, architectural decisions, known issues, and existing feature definitions for a Motoko + React PWA POS rebuild. Serves as a full-state specification for required fixes, UI updates, and inventory/checkout corrections.
